results.name: Number T(n,k) of reduced decompositions for all permutations of [n] with exactly k inversions; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n*(n-1)/2, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..10, flattened
R. P. Stanley, On the number of reduced decompositions of elements of Coxeter groups, European J. Combin., 5 (1984), 359-372.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 12 2017
